00045 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 #define SD_DUMMY_DATA                     (0xFF)
00047 
00048 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /* Start Data Tokens                                                                                        */
00050 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 #define SD_START_SINGLE_BLOCK_READ        (0xFE)
00052 #define SD_START_SINGLE_BLOCK_WRITE       (0xFE)
00053 #define SD_START_MULTIPLE_BLOCK_READ      (0xFE)
00054 #define SD_START_MULTIPLE_BLOCK_WRITE     (0xFC)
00055 #define SD_STOP_MULTIPLE_BLOCK_WRITE      (0xFD)
00056 
00057 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00058 /* SD Commands                                                                                              */
00059 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00060 #define SD_CMD00_GO_IDLE_STATE            (0)    /* 0x40                                                    */
00061 #define SD_CMD01_SEND_OP_COND             (1)    /* 0x41                                                    */
00062 #define SD_CMD08_SEND_IF_COMD             (8)    /* 0x48                                                    */
00063 #define SD_CMD09_SEND_CSD                 (9)    /* 0x49                                                    */
00064 #define SD_CMD10_SEND_CID                 (10)   /* 0x4A                                                    */
00065 #define SD_CMD12_STOP_TRAN                (12)   /* 0x4C                                                    */
00066 #define SD_CMD13_SEND_STATUS              (13)   /* 0x4D                                                    */
00067 #define SD_CMD16_SETBLOCKLEN              (16)   /* 0x50                                                    */
00068 #define SD_CMD55_APP_CMD                  (55)   /* 0x77                                                    */
00069 #define SD_CMD58_READ_OCR                 (58)   /* 0x7A                                                    */
00070 #define SD_CMD59_CRC_ONOFF                (59)   /* 0x7B                                                    */
00071 #define SD_ACMD41_SEND_OP_COND            (41)   /* 0x69                                                    */
00072 
00073 #define SD_READ_SINGLE_BLOCK              (17)   /* 0x51                                                    */
00074 #define SD_READ_MULTIPLE_BLOCK            (18)   /* 0x52                                                    */
00075 #define SD_WRITE_BLOCK                    (24)   /* 0x58                                                    */
00076 #define SD_WRITE_MULTIPLE_BLOCK           (25)   /* 0x59                                                    */
00077 
00078 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00079 /* Write Data Response                                                                                      */
00080 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00081 #define SD_DATA_OK                        (0x5)
00082 #define SD_DATA_CRC_ERROR                 (0xB)
00083 #define SD_DATA_WRITE_ERROR               (0xD)
00084 #define SD_DATA_ERROR                     (0xF)
00085 
00086 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00087 static u8 SD_ReadByte(void);
00088 //static void SD_WriteByte(u8 uData);
00089 static void SD_SendCmd(u32 uCmd, u32 uParameter, u32 uCrc);
00090 static u32 SD_GetResponse(u8 uResponse, u32 uTimeout);
00091 static u32 SD_GetDataResponse(void);
00092 //static u32 SD_GetStatus(void);
00093 static u32 SD_SetIdleStateSPI(void);
00094 static u32 SD_ClearSPIFIFO(void);
00095 static void SD_DummyDealy(void);
00096 static void SPI_Configuration(u32 uSpeed);

00098 /* Private macro -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00099 #if (SD_DEBUG == 1)
00100 #define SDDBG   printf
00101 #else
00102 #define SDDBG(...)
00103 #endif
00104 
00105 #define SD_WriteByte(uData)  SPI_SendData(SD_SPI_PORT, uData)

00108 u32 uSD_IsSDHC = FALSE;

00110 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00111 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00112   * @brief  The initial function of SD Memory card driver.
00113   * @retval result: SD_RESPONSE_ERR: SD card response failed.
00114   *                 SD_RESPONSE_NOERR: SD card response is successfully.
00115   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00116 u32 SD_Init(void)
00117 {
00118   u8 uResult;
00119   s32 i;
00120   u32 uTimeoutCount = SD_INIT_CNT;
00121   u32 uRetry = 3;
00122   SDDBG("\r\n");
00123 
00124   if (SD_IsCardDetected() == FALSE)
00125   {
00126     return SD_RESPONSE_ERR;
00127   }
00128 
00129   SPI_Configuration(SD_SPI_DIV);
00130 
00131   SD_CS_INACTIVE();
00132   for (i = 10; i > 0; i--)
00133   {
00134     SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00135     while ((SD_SPI_PORT->SR & SPI_FLAG_BUSY));
00136   }
00137 
00138   do
00139   {
00140     SDDBG("SD: Try %d\r\nSD: CMD00\t", 3 - uRetry);
00141     do
00142     {
00143       SD_CS_ACTIVE();
00144       SD_SendCmd(SD_CMD00_GO_IDLE_STATE, 0, 0x95);
00145       uResult = SD_GetResponse(SD_IN_IDLE_STATE, 0x1FF);
00146       SD_CS_INACTIVE();
00147       uTimeoutCount--;
00148     } while ((uResult != SD_RESPONSE_NOERR) && (uTimeoutCount));
00149 
00150     if (uTimeoutCount == 0)
00151     {
00152       SDDBG("Failed\r\n");
00153       uTimeoutCount = SD_INIT_CNT;
00154       uRetry--;
00155       continue;
00156     }
00157     SDDBG("OK\r\n");
00158 
00159     uResult = SD_SetIdleStateSPI();
00160     if (uResult == SD_RESPONSE_NOERR)
00161     {
00162       break;
00163     }
00164     uRetry--;
00165   } while (uRetry != 0);
00166 
00167   #if 0
00168   SD_CS_ACTIVE();
00169   SD_SendCmd(SD_CMD59_CRC_ONOFF, 0, 0);
00170   SD_GetResponse(SD_IN_IDLE_STATE, 0xFF);
00171   SD_CS_INACTIVE();
00172   SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00173   #endif
00174 
00175   #if 0
00176   if (uSD_IsSDHC == FALSE)
00177   {
00178     SD_CS_ACTIVE();
00179     SD_SendCmd(SD_CMD16_SETBLOCKLEN, 512, 0);
00180     SD_GetResponse(SD_IN_IDLE_STATE, 0xFF);
00181     SD_CS_INACTIVE();
00182     SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00183   }
00184   #endif
00185 
00186   return uResult;
00187 }
00188 
00189 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00190   * @brief  Read a block of data from SD card.
00191   * @param  pBuf: Point to the buffer of received data from SD card
00192   * @param  uReadAddr: The start address of SD card read operation
00193   * @param  uReadSize: The number of byte data that read from SD card
00194   * @retval uResult: SD_RESPONSE_ERR: SD card response failed.
00195   *                  SD_RESPONSE_NOERR: SD card response is successfully.
00196   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00197 u32 SD_ReadBlock(u8* pBuf, u32 uReadAddr, u32 uReadSize)
00198 {
00199   u8 uResult = SD_RESPONSE_ERR;
00200   s32 i;
00201   //s32 j;
00202 
00203 #if (SDHC_SUPPORT == 1)
00204   if (uSD_IsSDHC == FALSE)
00205 #endif
00206   {
00207     uReadAddr *= SD_BLOCK_SIZE;
00208   }
00209 
00210   SDDBG("SD: Read block, addr[%d] size[%d]\r\n", uReadAddr, uReadSize);
00211 
00212   SD_CS_ACTIVE();
00213   SD_SendCmd(SD_READ_SINGLE_BLOCK, uReadAddr, 0xFF);
00214 
00215   /* Wait for response in the R1 format (0x00 is no errors)                                                 */
00216   if (!SD_GetResponse(SD_RESPONSE_NOERR, SD_GETRSP_CNT))
00217   {
00218     /* Wait for data token start byte                                                                       */
00219     if (!SD_GetResponse(SD_START_SINGLE_BLOCK_READ, SD_GETRSP_CNT))
00220     {
00221       for (i = uReadSize / 8; i > 0; i--)
00222       {
00223         #if 0
00224         for (j = 8; j > 0; j--)
00225         {
00226           SPI_SendData(SD_SPI_PORT, SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00227         }
00228         #else
00229         SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00230         SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00231         SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00232         SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00233         SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00234         SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00235         SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00236         SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00237         #endif
00238 
00239         //while (SPI_GetFIFOStatus(SD_SPI_PORT, SPI_FIFO_RX) != 8);
00240         while (((SD_SPI_PORT->FSR & 0xf0) >> 4) != 8);
00241 
00242         #if 0
00243         for (j = 8; j > 0; j--)
00244         {
00245           *pBuf++ = SPI_ReceiveData(SD_SPI_PORT);
00246         }
00247         #else
00248         *pBuf++ = SD_SPI_PORT->DR;
00249         *pBuf++ = SD_SPI_PORT->DR;
00250         *pBuf++ = SD_SPI_PORT->DR;
00251         *pBuf++ = SD_SPI_PORT->DR;
00252         *pBuf++ = SD_SPI_PORT->DR;
00253         *pBuf++ = SD_SPI_PORT->DR;
00254         *pBuf++ = SD_SPI_PORT->DR;
00255         *pBuf++ = SD_SPI_PORT->DR;
00256         #endif
00257       }
00258 
00259       /* Get 16-bit CRC                                                                                     */
00260       //SD_ReadByte();
00261       //SD_ReadByte();
00262       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00263       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00264 
00265       /* Set response value to success                                                                      */
00266       uResult = SD_RESPONSE_NOERR;
00267     }
00268     else
00269     {
00270       SDDBG("\r\nI. Read block error!!\r\n");
00271     }
00272   }
00273   else
00274   {
00275     SDDBG("\r\nII. Read block error!!\r\n");
00276   }
00277 
00278   SD_CS_INACTIVE();
00279   SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00280 
00281   return uResult;
00282 }
00283 
00284 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00285   * @brief  Read multiple block of data from SD card.
00286   * @param  pBuf: Point to the buffer of received data from SD card
00287   * @param  uReadAddr: The start address of SD card read operation
00288   * @param  uReadSize: The number of byte data that read from SD card
00289   * @retval uResult: SD_RESPONSE_ERR: SD card response failed.
00290   *                  SD_RESPONSE_NOERR: SD card response is successfully.
00291   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00292 u32 SD_ReadMultipleBlock(u8* pBuf, u32 uReadAddr, u32 uReadSize)
00293 {
00294   u32 uResult = SD_RESPONSE_ERR;
00295   u32 uReadCount;
00296   s32 i;
00297 
00298 #if (SDHC_SUPPORT == 1)
00299   if (uSD_IsSDHC == FALSE)
00300 #endif
00301   {
00302     uReadAddr *= SD_BLOCK_SIZE;
00303   }
00304 
00305   uReadCount = uReadSize / SD_BLOCK_SIZE;
00306 
00307   SDDBG("SD: Read multiple block, addr[%d] size[%d]\r\n", uReadAddr, uReadSize);
00308 
00309   SD_CS_ACTIVE();
00310   SD_SendCmd(SD_READ_MULTIPLE_BLOCK, uReadAddr, 0xFF);
00311   if (SD_GetResponse(SD_RESPONSE_NOERR, SD_GETRSP_CNT))
00312   {
00313     return SD_RESPONSE_ERR;
00314   }
00315 
00316   while (uReadCount--)
00317   {
00318     if (!SD_GetResponse(SD_START_MULTIPLE_BLOCK_READ, SD_GETRSP_CNT))
00319     {
00320       #if 0
00321       for (i = SD_BLOCK_SIZE; i > 0; i--)
00322       {
00323         *pBuf++ = SD_ReadByte();
00324       }
00325       #endif
00326       for (i = SD_BLOCK_SIZE / 8; i > 0; i--)
00327       {
00328         SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00329         SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00330         SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00331         SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00332         SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00333         SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00334         SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00335         SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00336 
00337         while (((SD_SPI_PORT->FSR & 0xf0) >> 4) != 8);
00338 
00339         *pBuf++ = SD_SPI_PORT->DR;
00340         *pBuf++ = SD_SPI_PORT->DR;
00341         *pBuf++ = SD_SPI_PORT->DR;
00342         *pBuf++ = SD_SPI_PORT->DR;
00343         *pBuf++ = SD_SPI_PORT->DR;
00344         *pBuf++ = SD_SPI_PORT->DR;
00345         *pBuf++ = SD_SPI_PORT->DR;
00346         *pBuf++ = SD_SPI_PORT->DR;
00347       }
00348 
00349       //SD_ReadByte();
00350       //SD_ReadByte();
00351       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00352       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00353 
00354       uResult = SD_RESPONSE_NOERR;
00355     }
00356     else
00357     {
00358       uResult = SD_RESPONSE_ERR;
00359     }
00360   }
00361 
00362   SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00363   SD_SendCmd(SD_CMD12_STOP_TRAN, 0x0, 0x0);
00364 
00365   if (SD_GetResponse(SD_RESPONSE_NOERR, SD_GETRSP_CNT))
00366   {
00367     return SD_RESPONSE_ERR;
00368   }
00369 
00370   while (SD_IsReadBusy() == TRUE);
00371 
00372   SD_CS_INACTIVE();
00373   SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00374 
00375   return uResult;
00376 }
00377 
00378 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00379   * @brief  Write a block of data to SD card.
00380   * @param  pBuf: Point to the buffer of data be written to SD card.
00381   * @param  uWritedAddr: The start address of SD card write operation.
00382   * @param  uWriteSize: The number of byte data that write to SD card.
00383   * @retval uResult: SD_RESPONSE_ERR: SD card response failed.
00384   *                  SD_RESPONSE_NOERR: SD card response is successfully.
00385   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00386 u32 SD_WriteBlock(u8* pBuf, u32 uWritedAddr, u32 uWriteSize)
00387 {
00388   u32 uResult = SD_RESPONSE_ERR;
00389   s32 i;
00390   //s32 j;
00391 
00392 #if (SDHC_SUPPORT == 1)
00393   if (uSD_IsSDHC == FALSE)
00394 #endif
00395   {
00396     uWritedAddr *= SD_BLOCK_SIZE;
00397   }
00398 
00399   SDDBG("SD: Write block, addr[%d] size[%d]\r\n", uWritedAddr, uWriteSize);
00400 
00401   SD_CS_ACTIVE();
00402   SD_SendCmd(SD_WRITE_BLOCK, uWritedAddr, 0xFF);
00403 
00404   /* Wait for response in the R1 format (0x00 is no errors)                                                 */
00405   if (!SD_GetResponse(SD_RESPONSE_NOERR, SD_GETRSP_CNT))
00406   {
00407     SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00408     SD_WriteByte(SD_START_SINGLE_BLOCK_WRITE);  /* Start Block token                                        */
00409     while (SPI_GetFlagStatus(SD_SPI_PORT, SPI_FLAG_BUSY));
00410 
00411     for (i = uWriteSize / 8; i > 0 ; i--)
00412     {
00413       /* Wait until Tx FIFO empty                                                                           */
00414       //while (SPI_GetFIFOStatus(SD_SPI_PORT, SPI_FIFO_TX) != 0);
00415       while ((SD_SPI_PORT->FSR & 0xf) != 0);
00416 
00417       #if 0
00418       for (j = 8; j > 0; j--)
00419       {
00420         SPI_SendData(SD_SPI_PORT, *pBuf++);
00421       }
00422       #else
00423       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = *pBuf++;
00424       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = *pBuf++;
00425       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = *pBuf++;
00426       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = *pBuf++;
00427       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = *pBuf++;
00428       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = *pBuf++;
00429       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = *pBuf++;
00430       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = *pBuf++;
00431       #endif
00432     }
00433 
00434     //SD_ClearSPIFIFO();
00435 
00436     /* Get 16-bit CRC                                                                                       */
00437     //SD_ReadByte();
00438     //SD_ReadByte();
00439     SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00440     SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00441 
00442     /* Set response value to success                                                                        */
00443     if (SD_GetDataResponse() == SD_DATA_OK)
00444     {
00445       uResult = SD_RESPONSE_NOERR;
00446     }
00447     else
00448     {
00449       SDDBG("\r\nWrite block response error!!\r\n");
00450     }
00451   }
00452   else
00453   {
00454     SDDBG("\r\nWrite block error!!\r\n");
00455   }
00456 
00457   SD_CS_INACTIVE();
00458   SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00459 
00460   return uResult;
00461 }
00462 
00463 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00464   * @brief  Write multiple block of data to SD card..
00465   * @param  pBuf: Point to the buffer of data be written to SD card.
00466   * @param  uWritedAddr: The start address of SD card write operation.
00467   * @param  uWriteSize: The number of byte data that write to SD card.
00468   * @retval uResult: SD_RESPONSE_ERR: SD card response failed.
00469   *                  SD_RESPONSE_NOERR: SD card response is successfully.
00470   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00471 u32 SD_WriteMultipleBlock(u8* pBuf, u32 uWritedAddr, u32 uWriteSize)
00472 {
00473   u32 uResult = SD_RESPONSE_ERR;
00474   s32 i;
00475   u32 uBlockCount;
00476 
00477 #if (SDHC_SUPPORT == 1)
00478   if (uSD_IsSDHC == FALSE)
00479 #endif
00480   {
00481     uWritedAddr *= SD_BLOCK_SIZE;
00482   }
00483 
00484   uBlockCount = uWriteSize / SD_BLOCK_SIZE;
00485 
00486   SDDBG("SD: Write multiple block, addr[%d] size[%d]\r\n", uWritedAddr, uWriteSize);
00487 
00488   SD_CS_ACTIVE();
00489   SD_SendCmd(SD_WRITE_MULTIPLE_BLOCK, uWritedAddr, 0xFF);
00490   if (SD_GetResponse(SD_RESPONSE_NOERR, SD_GETRSP_CNT))
00491   {
00492     return SD_RESPONSE_ERR;
00493   }
00494 
00495   while (uBlockCount--)
00496   {
00497     /* Send start multiple block token                                                                      */
00498     //SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00499     //SD_WriteByte(SD_START_MULTIPLE_BLOCK_WRITE);
00500     SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00501     SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_START_MULTIPLE_BLOCK_WRITE;
00502 
00503     for (i = SD_BLOCK_SIZE / 8; i > 0; i--)
00504     {
00505       while ((SD_SPI_PORT->FSR & 0xf) != 0);
00506 
00507       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = *pBuf++;
00508       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = *pBuf++;
00509       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = *pBuf++;
00510       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = *pBuf++;
00511       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = *pBuf++;
00512       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = *pBuf++;
00513       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = *pBuf++;
00514       SD_SPI_PORT->DR = *pBuf++;
00515     }
00516 
00517     //SD_ClearSPIFIFO();
00518 
00519     /* Get 16-bit CRC                                                                                       */
00520     //SD_ReadByte();
00521     //SD_ReadByte();
00522     SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00523     SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00524 
00525     /* Set response value to success                                                                        */
00526     if (SD_GetDataResponse() == SD_DATA_OK)
00527     {
00528       uResult = SD_RESPONSE_NOERR;
00529     }
00530     else
00531     {
00532       SDDBG("\r\nData response error!\r\n");
00533       uResult = SD_RESPONSE_ERR;
00534       break;
00535     }
00536 
00537     while (SD_IsWriteBusy());
00538     SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00539   }
00540 
00541   /* Send multiple block stop write token                                                                   */
00542   SD_WriteByte(SD_STOP_MULTIPLE_BLOCK_WRITE);
00543 
00544   while (SD_IsWriteBusy());
00545 
00546   SD_CS_INACTIVE();
00547   SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00548 
00549   SD_CS_ACTIVE();
00550   while (SD_IsWriteBusy());
00551 
00552   SD_CS_INACTIVE();
00553   SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00554 
00555   return uResult;
00556 }
00557 
00558 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00559   * @brief  Get CSD Register from Sd Card..
00560   * @param  SD_CSD: structure point of CSD register.
00561   * @retval uStatus: SD_RESPONSE_ERR: SD card response failed.
00562   *                  SD_RESPONSE_NOERR: SD card response is successfully.
00563   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00564 u32 SD_GetCSDRegister(SD_CSD_TypeDef* SD_CSD)
00565 {
00566   u32 i;
00567   u32 uStatus = SD_RESPONSE_ERR;
00568   u8 uCSDTab[16];
00569 
00570   SD_CS_ACTIVE();
00571   SD_SendCmd(SD_CMD09_SEND_CSD, 0, 0xFF);
00572 
00573   /* Wait for response in the R1 format (0x00 is no errors)                                                 */
00574   if (!SD_GetResponse(SD_RESPONSE_NOERR, SD_GETRSP_CNT))
00575   {
00576     /* Wait for data token start byte                                                                       */
00577     if (!SD_GetResponse(SD_START_SINGLE_BLOCK_READ, SD_GETRSP_CNT))
00578     {
00579       for (i = 0; i < 16; i++)
00580       {
00581         /* Store CSD register value on CSD_Tab                                                              */
00582         uCSDTab[i] = SD_ReadByte();
00583       }
00584 
00585       /* Get 16-bit CRC                                                                                     */
00586       SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00587       SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00588 
00589       /* Set response value to success                                                                      */
00590       uStatus = SD_RESPONSE_NOERR;
00591     }
00592   }
00593 
00594   for (i = 3; i > 0; i--)
00595   {
00596     SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00597   }
00598   SD_CS_INACTIVE();
00599   SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00600 
00601   /* Byte 0                                                                                                 */
00602   SD_CSD->CSDStruct            = (uCSDTab[0] & 0xC0) >> 6;
00603   SD_CSD->SysSpecVersion       = (uCSDTab[0] & 0x3C) >> 2;
00604   SD_CSD->Reserved1            = uCSDTab[0] & 0x03;
00605   /* Byte 1                                                                                                 */
00606   SD_CSD->TAAC                 = uCSDTab[1];
00607   /* Byte 2                                                                                                 */
00608   SD_CSD->NSAC                 = uCSDTab[2];
00609   /* Byte 3                                                                                                 */
00610   SD_CSD->MaxBusClkFrec        = uCSDTab[3];
00611   /* Byte 4                                                                                                 */
00612   SD_CSD->CardComdClasses      = uCSDTab[4] << 4;
00613   /* Byte 5                                                                                                 */
00614   SD_CSD->CardComdClasses     |= (uCSDTab[5] & 0xF0) >> 4;
00615   SD_CSD->RdBlockLen           = uCSDTab[5] & 0x0F;
00616   /* Byte 6                                                                                                 */
00617   SD_CSD->PartBlockRead        = (uCSDTab[6] & 0x80) >> 7;
00618   SD_CSD->WrBlockMisalign      = (uCSDTab[6] & 0x40) >> 6;
00619   SD_CSD->RdBlockMisalign      = (uCSDTab[6] & 0x20) >> 5;
00620   SD_CSD->DSRImpl              = (uCSDTab[6] & 0x10) >> 4;
00621   SD_CSD->Reserved2            = 0;
00622   SD_CSD->DeviceSize           = (uCSDTab[6] & 0x03) << 10;
00623   /* Byte 7                                                                                                 */
00624   SD_CSD->DeviceSize          |= (uCSDTab[7]) << 2;
00625   /* Byte 8                                                                                                 */
00626   SD_CSD->DeviceSize          |= (uCSDTab[8] & 0xC0) >> 6;
00627   SD_CSD->MaxRdCurrentVDDMin   = (uCSDTab[8] & 0x38) >> 3;
00628   SD_CSD->MaxRdCurrentVDDMax   = (uCSDTab[8] & 0x07);
00629   /* Byte 9                                                                                                 */
00630   SD_CSD->MaxWrCurrentVDDMin   = (uCSDTab[9] & 0xE0) >> 5;
00631   SD_CSD->MaxWrCurrentVDDMax   = (uCSDTab[9] & 0x1C) >> 2;
00632   SD_CSD->DeviceSizeMul        = (uCSDTab[9] & 0x03) << 1;
00633   /* Byte 10                                                                                                */
00634   SD_CSD->DeviceSizeMul       |= (uCSDTab[10] & 0x80) >> 7;
00635   SD_CSD->EraseGrSize          = (uCSDTab[10] & 0x7C) >> 2;
00636   SD_CSD->EraseGrMul           = (uCSDTab[10] & 0x03) << 3;
00637   /* Byte 11                                                                                                */
00638   SD_CSD->EraseGrMul          |= (uCSDTab[11] & 0xE0) >> 5;
00639   SD_CSD->WrProtectGrSize      = (uCSDTab[11] & 0x1F);
00640   /* Byte 12                                                                                                */
00641   SD_CSD->WrProtectGrEnable    = (uCSDTab[12] & 0x80) >> 7;
00642   SD_CSD->ManDeflECC           = (uCSDTab[12] & 0x60) >> 5;
00643   SD_CSD->WrSpeedFact          = (uCSDTab[12] & 0x1C) >> 2;
00644   SD_CSD->MaxWrBlockLen        = (uCSDTab[12] & 0x03) << 2;
00645   /* Byte 13                                                                                                */
00646   SD_CSD->MaxWrBlockLen       |= (uCSDTab[13] & 0xc0) >> 6;
00647   SD_CSD->WriteBlockPaPartial  = (uCSDTab[13] & 0x20) >> 5;
00648   SD_CSD->Reserved3            = 0;
00649   SD_CSD->ContentProtectAppli  = (uCSDTab[13] & 0x01);
00650   /* Byte 14                                                                                                */
00651   SD_CSD->FileFormatGrouop     = (uCSDTab[14] & 0x80) >> 7;
00652   SD_CSD->CopyFlag             = (uCSDTab[14] & 0x40) >> 6;
00653   SD_CSD->PermWrProtect        = (uCSDTab[14] & 0x20) >> 5;
00654   SD_CSD->TempWrProtect        = (uCSDTab[14] & 0x10) >> 4;
00655   SD_CSD->FileFormat           = (uCSDTab[14] & 0x0C) >> 2;
00656   SD_CSD->ECC                  = (uCSDTab[14] & 0x03);
00657   /* Byte 15                                                                                                */
00658   SD_CSD->msd_CRC              = (uCSDTab[15] & 0xFE) >> 1;
00659   SD_CSD->Reserved4            = 1;
00660 
00661 #if (SDHC_SUPPORT == 1)
00662   if (uSD_IsSDHC == 1)
00663   {
00664     /* Byte 7                                                                                               */
00665     SD_CSD->DeviceSize = (u16)(uCSDTab[8]) * 256;
00666     /* Byte 8                                                                                               */
00667     SD_CSD->DeviceSize += uCSDTab[9];
00668   }
00669 #endif
00670 
00671   /* Return the response                                                                                    */
00672   return uStatus;
00673 }
00674 
00675 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00676   * @brief  Get CID Register from Sd Card.
00677   * @param  SD_CID: structure point of CID register.
00678   * @retval uStatus: SD_RESPONSE_ERR: SD card response failed.
00679   *                  SD_RESPONSE_NOERR: SD card response is successfully.
00680   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00681 u32 SD_GetCIDRegister(SD_CID_TypeDef* SD_CID)
00682 {
00683   u32 i = 0;
00684   u32 uStatus = SD_RESPONSE_ERR;
00685   u8 uCIDTab[16];
00686 
00687   SD_CS_ACTIVE();
00688   SD_SendCmd(SD_CMD10_SEND_CID, 0, 0xFF);
00689 
00690   /* Wait for response in the R1 format (0x00 is no errors)                                                 */
00691   if (!SD_GetResponse(SD_RESPONSE_NOERR, SD_GETRSP_CNT))
00692   {
00693     if (!SD_GetResponse(SD_START_SINGLE_BLOCK_READ, SD_GETRSP_CNT))
00694     {
00695       /* Store CID register value on CID_Tab                                                                */
00696       for (i = 0; i < 16; i++)
00697       {
00698         uCIDTab[i] = SD_ReadByte();
00699       }
00700     }
00701     /* Get 16-bit CRC                                                                                       */
00702     SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00703     SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00704     /* Set response value to success                                                                        */
00705     uStatus = SD_RESPONSE_NOERR;
00706   }
00707 
00708   for (i = 3; i > 0; i--)
00709   {
00710     SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00711   }
00712   SD_CS_INACTIVE();
00713   SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00714 
00715   /* Byte 0                                                                                                 */
00716   SD_CID->ManufacturerID = uCIDTab[0];
00717   /* Byte 1                                                                                                 */
00718   SD_CID->OEM_AppliID = uCIDTab[1] << 8;
00719   /* Byte 2                                                                                                 */
00720   SD_CID->OEM_AppliID |= uCIDTab[2];
00721   /* Byte 3                                                                                                 */
00722   SD_CID->ProdName1 = uCIDTab[3] << 24;
00723   /* Byte 4                                                                                                 */
00724   SD_CID->ProdName1 |= uCIDTab[4] << 16;
00725   /* Byte 5                                                                                                 */
00726   SD_CID->ProdName1 |= uCIDTab[5] << 8;
00727   /* Byte 6                                                                                                 */
00728   SD_CID->ProdName1 |= uCIDTab[6];
00729   /* Byte 7                                                                                                 */
00730   SD_CID->ProdName2 = uCIDTab[7];
00731   /* Byte 8                                                                                                 */
00732   SD_CID->ProdRev = uCIDTab[8];
00733   /* Byte 9                                                                                                 */
00734   SD_CID->ProdSN = uCIDTab[9] << 24;
00735   /* Byte 10                                                                                                */
00736   SD_CID->ProdSN |= uCIDTab[10] << 16;
00737   /* Byte 11                                                                                                */
00738   SD_CID->ProdSN |= uCIDTab[11] << 8;
00739   /* Byte 12                                                                                                */
00740   SD_CID->ProdSN |= uCIDTab[12];
00741   /* Byte 13                                                                                                */
00742   SD_CID->Reserved1 |= (uCIDTab[13] & 0xF0) >> 4;
00743   /* Byte 14                                                                                                */
00744   SD_CID->ManufactDate = (uCIDTab[13] & 0x0F) << 8;
00745   /* Byte 15                                                                                                */
00746   SD_CID->ManufactDate |= uCIDTab[14];
00747   /* Byte 16                                                                                                */
00748   SD_CID->msd_CRC = (uCIDTab[15] & 0xFE) >> 1;
00749   SD_CID->Reserved2 = 1;
00750 
00751   /* Return the response                                                                                    */
00752   return uStatus;
00753 }
00754 
00755 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00756   * @brief  Check the block write status.
00757   * @retval TRUE: write operation is busy. FALSE: write operation is finished.
00758   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00759 u32 SD_IsWriteBusy(void)
00760 {
00761   SD_ClearSPIFIFO();
00762 
00763   return((SD_ReadByte() == 0xFF) ? FALSE : TRUE);
00764 }
00765 
00766 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00767   * @brief  Check the block read status.
00768   * @retval TRUE: read operation is busy. FALSE: write operation is finished.
00769   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00770 u32 SD_IsReadBusy(void)
00771 {
00772   SD_ClearSPIFIFO();
00773 
00774   return((SD_ReadByte() == 0x0) ? TRUE : FALSE);
00775 }
00776 
00777 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00778   * @brief  Check the card inserted or not.
00779   * @retval TRUE: Card is detected. FALSE Card is not detected.
00780   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00781 u32 SD_IsCardDetected(void)
00782 {
00783   return((SD_CD_READ() == 0x0) ? TRUE : FALSE);
00784 }
00785 
00786 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00787 
00788 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00789   * @brief  Read one byte data from SD card.
00790   * @retval uData: Received data (1 Byte).
00791   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00792 static u8 SD_ReadByte(void)
00793 {
00794   u8 uData = 0;
00795 
00796   //SPI_SendData(SD_SPI_PORT, SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00797   SD_SPI_PORT->DR = SD_DUMMY_DATA;
00798 
00799   /* Wait data ready                                                                                        */
00800   //while (SPI_GetFIFOStatus(SD_SPI_PORT, SPI_FIFO_RX) == 0);
00801   while (((SD_SPI_PORT->FSR & 0xf0) >> 4) == 0);
00802 
00803   //uData = SPI_ReceiveData(SD_SPI_PORT);
00804   uData = SD_SPI_PORT->DR;
00805 
00806   return uData;
00807 }
00808 
00809 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00810   * @brief  Send 6 bytes command to SD card.
00811   * @param  uCmd: SD command
00812   * @param  uParameter: Command argument
00813   * @param  uCrc: CRC7
00814   * @retval None
00815   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00816 static void SD_SendCmd(u32 uCmd, u32 uParameter, u32 uCrc)
00817 {
00818   s32 i;
00819   u8 uData[6];
00820 
00821   uData[5] = (uCmd | 0x40);
00822   uData[4] = (u8)(uParameter >> 24);
00823   uData[3] = (u8)(uParameter >> 16);
00824   uData[2] = (u8)(uParameter >> 8);
00825   uData[1] = (u8)(uParameter);
00826   uData[0] = (uCrc);
00827 
00828   for (i = 5; i >= 0; i--)
00829   {
00830     //SD_WriteByte(uData[i]);
00831     SD_SPI_PORT->DR = uData[i];
00832   }
00833 
00834   SD_ClearSPIFIFO();
00835 
00836   return;
00837 }
00838 
00839 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00840   * @brief  Get response from SD card.
00841   * @param  uResponse: the response token
00842   * @param  uTimeout: Timeout value
00843   * @retval result: SD_RESPONSE_ERR: SD card response failed.
00844   *                 SD_RESPONSE_NOERR: SD card response is successfully.
00845   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00846 static u32 SD_GetResponse(u8 uResponse, u32 uTimeout)
00847 {
00848   u32 uTimeoutCount = uTimeout;
00849   u32 uValue;
00850   SD_ClearSPIFIFO();
00851 
00852   do
00853   {
00854     uValue = SD_ReadByte();
00855     if (uValue == uResponse)
00856     {
00857       break;
00858     }
00859     uTimeoutCount--;
00860   } while (uTimeoutCount);
00861 
00862   if (uTimeoutCount == 0)
00863   {
00864     return SD_RESPONSE_ERR;
00865   }
00866   else
00867   {
00868     return SD_RESPONSE_NOERR;
00869   }
00870 }
00871 
00872 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00873   * @brief  Get data response token form SD card.
00874   * @retval uResult: SD_DATA_OK, SD_DATA_CRC_ERROR, SD_DATA_WRITE_ERROR, SD_DATA_ERROR
00875   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00876 static u32 SD_GetDataResponse(void)
00877 {
00878   u32 uResult = 0;
00879   u32 uTimeoutCount = SD_GETDRSP_CNT;
00880 
00881   SD_ClearSPIFIFO();
00882 
00883   while (uTimeoutCount--)
00884   {
00885     uResult = SD_ReadByte() & 0x1F;  /* Mask data response bit5~7                                           */
00886     if (uResult == SD_DATA_OK)
00887     {
00888       break;
00889     }
00890   }
00891 
00892   /* Wait for data is zero                                                                                  */
00893   while (SD_ReadByte() == 0);
00894 
00895   return uResult;
00896 }
00897 
00898 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00899   * @brief  Get status from SD card.
00900   * @retval uStatus: The SD Card status
00901   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00902 #if 0
00903 static u32 SD_GetStatus(void)
00904 {
00905   u32 uStatus;
00906 
00907   SD_CS_ACTIVE();
00908   SD_SendCmd(SD_CMD13_SEND_STATUS, 0, 0xFF);
00909 
00910   uStatus = SD_ReadByte();
00911   uStatus |= (u16)(SD_ReadByte() << 8);
00912 
00913   SD_CS_INACTIVE();
00914   SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00915 
00916   return uStatus;
00917 }
00918 #endif
00919 
00920 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00921   * @brief  Set SD card as idle state and SPI mode.
00922   * @retval result: SD_RESPONSE_ERR: SD card response failed.
00923   *                 SD_RESPONSE_NOERR: SD card response is successfully.
00924   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00925 static u32 SD_SetIdleStateSPI(void)
00926 {
00927   u32 uTimeoutCount;
00928   u32 uResult;
00929   u32 i;
00930 
00931 #if (SDHC_SUPPORT == 1)
00932 
00933   SD_DummyDealy();
00934 
00935   uTimeoutCount = SD_CHECK_VER;
00936 
00937   SDDBG("SD: CMD08\t");
00938   SD_SendCmd(SD_CMD08_SEND_IF_COMD, 0x1AA, 0x87);
00939 
00940   do
00941   {
00942     uResult = SD_ReadByte();
00943     if (uResult != 0xFF)
00944     {
00945       break;
00946     }
00947     uTimeoutCount--;
00948   } while (uTimeoutCount);
00949 
00950   if (uTimeoutCount == 0)
00951   {
00952     SDDBG("Failed\r\n");
00953     return SD_RESPONSE_ERR;
00954   }
00955   SDDBG("OK R1=%x\r\n", uResult);
00956 
00957   if (uResult == (SD_IN_IDLE_STATE | SD_ILLEGAL_COMMAND))
00958   {
00959     uSD_IsSDHC = FALSE;
00960 #endif
00961 
00962     SDDBG("SD: SD Mode\r\n");
00963 
00964     for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00965     {
00966       SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
00967     }
00968     SD_ClearSPIFIFO();
00969 
00970     SDDBG("SD: CMD55, ACMD41\t");
00971     uTimeoutCount = 0xFFFF;
00972     do
00973     {
00974       SD_DummyDealy();
00975       SD_SendCmd(SD_CMD55_APP_CMD, 0, 0x0);
00976       uResult = SD_GetResponse(SD_IN_IDLE_STATE, 0xFF);
00977       if (uResult == SD_RESPONSE_NOERR)
00978       {
00979         SD_DummyDealy();
00980         SD_SendCmd(SD_ACMD41_SEND_OP_COND, 0x0, 0x0);
00981         uResult = SD_GetResponse(SD_RESPONSE_NOERR, 0xFF);
00982         if (uResult == SD_RESPONSE_NOERR)
00983         {
00984           break;
00985         }
00986       }
00987       uTimeoutCount--;
00988     } while (uTimeoutCount);
00989 
00990     if (uTimeoutCount == 0)
00991     {
00992       SDDBG("Failed\r\n");
00993       SDDBG("SD: CMD01\t");
00994       uTimeoutCount = SD_IDLE_CNT;
00995       do
00996       {
00997         SD_DummyDealy();
00998         SD_SendCmd(SD_CMD01_SEND_OP_COND, 0, 0xFF);
00999         uTimeoutCount--;
01000       } while (SD_GetResponse(SD_RESPONSE_NOERR, SD_GETRSP_CNT) && uTimeoutCount);
01001 
01002       SD_CS_INACTIVE();
01003       SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
01004 
01005       if (uTimeoutCount == 0)
01006       {
01007         SDDBG("Failed\r\n");
01008         return SD_RESPONSE_ERR;
01009       }
01010     }
01011     for (i = 4; i > 0; i--)
01012     {
01013       SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
01014     }
01015     SDDBG("OK\r\n");
01016 
01017     SD_CS_INACTIVE();
01018     SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
01019     SPI_Configuration(SD_SPI_DIV_HIGHSPEED);
01020 
01021 #if (SDHC_SUPPORT == 1)
01022   }
01023   else if (uResult == (SD_IN_IDLE_STATE | SD_RESPONSE_NOERR))
01024   {
01025     for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
01026     {
01027       SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
01028     }
01029     SD_ClearSPIFIFO();
01030 
01031     SDDBG("SD: CMD55, ACMD41\t");
01032     uTimeoutCount = 0xFFFF;
01033     do
01034     {
01035       SD_DummyDealy();
01036       SD_SendCmd(SD_CMD55_APP_CMD, 0, 0x0);
01037       uResult = SD_GetResponse(SD_IN_IDLE_STATE, 0xFF);
01038       if (uResult == SD_RESPONSE_NOERR)
01039       {
01040         SD_DummyDealy();
01041         SD_SendCmd(SD_ACMD41_SEND_OP_COND, 0x40000000, 0x0);
01042         uResult = SD_GetResponse(SD_RESPONSE_NOERR, 0xFF);
01043         if (uResult == SD_RESPONSE_NOERR)
01044         {
01045           break;
01046         }
01047       }
01048       uTimeoutCount--;
01049     } while (uTimeoutCount);
01050 
01051     if (uTimeoutCount == 0)
01052     {
01053       SDDBG("Failed\r\n");
01054       return SD_RESPONSE_ERR;
01055     }
01056     else
01057     {
01058       SDDBG("OK\r\n");
01059       SDDBG("SD: CMD58\t");
01060 
01061       SD_DummyDealy();
01062       SD_SendCmd(SD_CMD58_READ_OCR, 0, 0x0);
01063 
01064       for (i = 0; i < 0xFFFFFF; i++)
01065       {
01066         uResult = SD_ReadByte();
01067         if (uResult != 0xFF)
01068         {
01069          break;
01070         }
01071       }
01072 
01073       if (i == 0xFFFFFF)
01074       {
01075         SDDBG("Failed\r\n");
01076         return SD_RESPONSE_ERR;
01077       }
01078 
01079       uResult = SD_ReadByte();
01080       SDDBG("OK OCR %x\r\n", uResult);
01081       if (uResult & 0x40)
01082       {
01083         uSD_IsSDHC = TRUE;
01084         SDDBG("SD: SDHC Mode\r\n");
01085       }
01086       else
01087       {
01088         uSD_IsSDHC = FALSE;
01089         SDDBG("SD: SD Mode\r\n");
01090       }
01091       for (i = 4; i > 0; i--)
01092       {
01093         SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
01094       }
01095       SD_CS_INACTIVE();
01096       SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
01097       SPI_Configuration(SD_SPI_DIV_HIGHSPEED);
01098     }
01099   }
01100   else
01101   {
01102     return SD_RESPONSE_ERR;
01103   }
01104 #endif
01105 
01106   SD_ClearSPIFIFO();
01107   return SD_RESPONSE_NOERR;
01108 }
01109 
01110 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
01111   * @brief  Clear SPI FIFO.
01112   * @retval None
01113   ***********************************************************************************************************/
01114 static u32 SD_ClearSPIFIFO(void)
01115 {
01116   vu32 uTemp;
01117 
01118   //while (SPI_GetFlagStatus(SD_SPI_PORT, SPI_FLAG_BUSY));
01119   while ((SD_SPI_PORT->SR & SPI_FLAG_BUSY));
01120 
01121   //while (SPI_GetFIFOStatus(SD_SPI_PORT, SPI_FIFO_RX) != 0)
01122   while (((SD_SPI_PORT->FSR & 0xf0) >> 4) != 0)
01123   {
01124     //SPI_ReceiveData(SD_SPI_PORT);
01125     uTemp = SD_SPI_PORT->DR;
01126   }
01127 
01128   return uTemp;
01129 }
01130 
01131 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
01132   * @brief  Dummy delay.
01133   * @retval None
01134   ***********************************************************************************************************/
01135 static void SD_DummyDealy(void)
01136 {
01137   SD_CS_INACTIVE();
01138   SD_WriteByte(SD_DUMMY_DATA);
01139   //while (SPI_GetFlagStatus(SD_SPI_PORT, SPI_FLAG_BUSY));
01140   while ((SD_SPI_PORT->SR & SPI_FLAG_BUSY));
01141   SD_CS_ACTIVE();
01142 }
01143 
01144 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
01145   * @brief  Configures the SPI Port.
01146   * @retval None
01147   ***********************************************************************************************************/
01148 static void SPI_Configuration(u32 uSpeed)
01149 {
01150   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
01151      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
01152      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
01153   */
01154   SPI_InitTypeDef SPI_InitStructure;
01155 
01156   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_Mode = SPI_MASTER;
01157   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_FIFO = SPI_FIFO_ENABLE;
01158   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_DataLength = SPI_DATALENGTH_8;
01159   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_SELMode = SPI_SEL_SOFTWARE;
01160   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_SELPolarity = SPI_SELPOLARITY_LOW;
01161   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_FirstBit = SPI_FIRSTBIT_MSB;
01162   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_CPOL = SPI_CPOL_HIGH;
01163   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_CPHA = SPI_CPHA_SECOND;
01164   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_RxFIFOTriggerLevel = 0;
01165   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_TxFIFOTriggerLevel = 0;
01166   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_ClockPrescaler = uSpeed;
01167   SPI_Init(SD_SPI_PORT, &SPI_InitStructure);
01168 
01169   SPI_SELOutputCmd(SD_SPI_PORT, ENABLE);
01170 
01171   SPI_Cmd(SD_SPI_PORT, ENABLE);
01172 
01173   return;
01174 }
01175

01178   * @}
01179   */
01180

01182   * @}
01183   */

01186   * @}
01187   */
